sentences.english: It is an inevitable choice to develop the strategy of famous brand for an enterprise in the keen market competitions.

sentences.english: Our goal is your market lead. Right from the start.

sentences.english: As the market environment changing competition in the market is hotting up visibly.

sentences.english: Nothing wrong price war, price competition is the first competition in the market.

sentences.english: The market competing of hemodialysis machine is fierce.

sentences.english: Spa resorts have continued to develop through SE Asia. The market is increasingly competitive.

sentences.english: In the fierce market competition, the way film and television production companies are expanding.

sentences.english: Product differentiation is one of the common strategic choices in the market competition.

sentences.english: The core of the market competition is scrabbling for the talent.
